import React,{useRef,useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BrickGirlRT=()=>{const canvasRef=useRef(null);const spriteRef=useRef(new Image());const[canvasSize,setCanvasSize]=useState({width:400,height:300});// 스프라이트 설정
const frameWidth=335;const frameHeight=512;const numCols=3;const scale=0.2;const frameX=useRef(0);const frameY=useRef(0);const frameCount=useRef(0);const[spriteLoaded,setSpriteLoaded]=useState(false);// 브릭걸 위치 및 점프 관련 변수
const girlX=useRef(50);const girlY=useRef(0);const velocityY=useRef(0);// velocityY가 너무 작으면 → 충분한 높이 도달 못함 : -12 → -13, -14 조정. 여기서 말고 아래쪽 값
const gravity=0.6;const jumpCount=useRef(0);const maxJumps=2;const isJumping=useRef(false);const bricks=useRef([]);// 벽돌 배열
// 지형 설정
const scrollSpeed=2;const tileSize=50;const groundTiles=useRef([]);const levelData=[{x:0,y:350},{x:50,y:350},{x:100,y:350},{x:150,y:350},{x:200,y:350},// 간격 (점프 유도)
{x:250,y:350},{x:350,y:350},{x:400,y:350},// 높은 지형
{x:500,y:300},{x:550,y:300},{x:600,y:250},{x:650,y:250},{x:700,y:200},{x:750,y:200}];// 초기 타일 로딩
useEffect(()=>{groundTiles.current=levelData.map(tile=>({...tile,type:'ground'}));},[]);// 착지 여부 체크
const isOnGround=()=>{const feetXLeft=girlX.current+10;const feetXRight=girlX.current+frameWidth*scale-10;const feetY=girlY.current+frameHeight*scale;return groundTiles.current.some(tile=>{const isWithinX=feetXRight>tile.x&&feetXLeft<tile.x+tileSize;const isTouchingY=feetY>=tile.y&&feetY<=tile.y+5;const isFalling=velocityY.current>=0;return isWithinX&&isTouchingY&&isFalling;});};// 벽돌 던지기
const throwBrick=()=>{const startX=girlX.current+30;const startY=girlY.current+10;const vx=6+Math.random();const vy=-8;bricks.current.push({x:startX,y:startY,vx,vy});};useEffect(()=>{const canvas=canvasRef.current;const ctx=canvas.getContext('2d');let animationFrameId;canvas.width=800;canvas.height=400;// 스프라이트 이미지 로드
spriteRef.current.src=process.env.PUBLIC_URL+'/brickgirl_sprite.png';spriteRef.current.onload=()=>{setSpriteLoaded(true);const standingTile=groundTiles.current.find(tile=>girlX.current+frameWidth*scale/2>tile.x&&girlX.current+frameWidth*scale/2<tile.x+tileSize);if(standingTile){girlY.current=standingTile.y-frameHeight*scale-4;}};// 키 입력 처리
const handleKeyDown=e=>{if(e.code==='Space'){e.preventDefault();throwBrick();}else if(e.code==='ArrowUp'){if(jumpCount.current<maxJumps){velocityY.current=-12*(jumpCount.current===1?1.2:1);jumpCount.current++;isJumping.current=true;}}};// 모바일 터치 조작 처리
const handleTouchStart=e=>{const touchX=e.touches[0].clientX;if(touchX<canvas.width/2){if(jumpCount.current<maxJumps){velocityY.current=-12;jumpCount.current++;}}else{throwBrick();}};const updateFrame=()=>{frameCount.current++;if(frameCount.current%10===0){frameX.current=(frameX.current+1)%numCols;}};const draw=()=>{ctx.clearRect(0,0,canvas.width,canvas.height);// 지형 렌더링
groundTiles.current.forEach(tile=>{tile.x-=scrollSpeed;ctx.fillStyle='saddlebrown';ctx.fillRect(tile.x,tile.y,tileSize,tileSize);});// 무한 스크롤 지형 추가
const lastTile=groundTiles.current[groundTiles.current.length-1];if(lastTile&&lastTile.x<canvas.width){groundTiles.current.push({x:lastTile.x+tileSize,y:350,type:'ground'});}// 점프 및 중력 처리
// 착지 판단 먼저
const onGround=isOnGround();if(onGround&&velocityY.current>=0){velocityY.current=0;jumpCount.current=0;isJumping.current=false;const landingTile=groundTiles.current.find(tile=>girlX.current+frameWidth*scale/2>tile.x&&girlX.current+frameWidth*scale/2<tile.x+tileSize);if(landingTile){girlY.current=landingTile.y-frameHeight*scale;}}else{velocityY.current+=gravity;girlY.current+=velocityY.current;const floorY=canvas.height-frameHeight*scale;if(girlY.current>floorY){velocityY.current=0;girlY.current=floorY;jumpCount.current=0;isJumping.current=false;}}// 벽돌 렌더링
ctx.font='16px Arial';bricks.current.forEach((brick,index)=>{brick.x+=brick.vx;brick.vy+=gravity*0.5;brick.y+=brick.vy;ctx.fillText('🧱',brick.x,brick.y);if(brick.x>canvas.width||brick.y>canvas.height){bricks.current.splice(index,1);}});/// 스프라이트 그리기
if(spriteLoaded){updateFrame();ctx.drawImage(spriteRef.current,frameX.current*frameWidth,frameY.current*frameHeight,frameWidth,frameHeight,girlX.current,girlY.current,frameWidth*scale,frameHeight*scale);}else{ctx.fillStyle='hotpink';ctx.fillRect(girlX.current,girlY.current,30,30);}animationFrameId=requestAnimationFrame(draw);};// 이벤트 리스너 및 루프 시작
window.addEventListener('keydown',handleKeyDown);canvas.addEventListener('touchstart',handleTouchStart);draw();return()=>{window.removeEventListener('keydown',handleKeyDown);canvas.removeEventListener('touchstart',handleTouchStart);cancelAnimationFrame(animationFrameId);};},[spriteLoaded]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex flex-col items-center mt-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"font-press font-bold mb-4 text-rose-400",children:"Brick Girl: Run & Throw"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("canvas",{ref:canvasRef,width:canvasSize.width,height:canvasSize.height,className:"bg-black rounded shadow-md touch-none",style:{width:"100%",maxWidth:"480px"}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-xs text-center mt-4 text-gray-500 dark:text-gray-400 font-press",children:"\u2B06\uFE0F: Jump / Space: \uD83E\uDDF1 (\uBAA8\uBC14\uC77C\uC740 \uD654\uBA74 \uC88C\uC6B0 \uD130\uCE58)"})]});};export default BrickGirlRT;
